document_data.name: Culthar
document_data.mainbody: '''Culthar''' was a male warrior who was one of the guards of the [[Twisted Tower]] in [[Shadowdale]]; secretly, he was also a member of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
document_data.History: In [[1357]], Culthar  was involved in the hunt for [[Shandril Shessair]], helping the Cult's archmage [[Malark Himbruel]] to enter the Twisted Tower.
